title: Doing It Rock Hard
description: Layla finds herself working at the Drunken Cat bar while on the run from The Devil’s MC. Working late one night, she is attacked outside the bar. When her father convinces her to learn self-defense so she never has to be a victim again, she doesn’t expect to find the love of her life. Retired MMA fighter Mad Max Malone suffered a career ending injury during his last fight in Vegas and now needs to learn to live outside the cage. He is instantly intrigued by the mouthy brunette who finds her way to his gym and he finds himself wanting to protect her. But when Layla’s worst fears come to life will they figure out a way to stop the MC and navigate their new found love? Or, will too many obstacles keep them apart forever?
author: Ember-Raine Winters
